full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 60 of 261 1200 LC6VMAX2 Kate - direct 1 A. Yes. The house had a beautiful swimming pool. And there were doors that opened up from the house onto the swimming pool. And Jefifrey had a desk that would face out onto outside so he could see out. And there was a kitchen downstairs, a small dining area, and there were bedrooms upstairs. 6 Q. What, if any, photographs did you see in Epstein's house in Palm Beach? 8 A. There were lots of photographs of young girls. 9 Q. What do you remember about those photographs? 10 A. I remember that they were shocking. 11 Q. Were the young girls clothed or unclothed in the photographs? 13 A. Unclothed. 14 Q. Where did you see those photographs in Epstein's house in Palm Beach? 16 A. They were in almost every room. 17 Q. Did there come a time that you were given clothing to wear when you were staying at Epstein's Palm Beach house? 19 A. Yes. 20 Q. What were you given to wear? 21 A. I was given a schoolgirl outfit. 22 Q. Can you please describe the schoolgirl outfit for the jury. 23 A. It was a short -- a short pleated skirt, white socks, white panties, and a shirt. 25 Q. Where did you find the schoolgirl outfit? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018397

1 A. Yes. The house had a beautiful swimming pool. And there were doors that opened up from the house onto the swimming pool. And Jefifrey had a desk that would face out onto outside so he could see out. And there was a kitchen downstairs, a small dining area, and there were bedrooms upstairs. 6 Q. What, if any, photographs did you see in Epstein's house in Palm Beach? 8 A. There were lots of photographs of young girls. 9 Q. What do you remember about those photographs? 10 A. I remember that they were shocking. 11 Q. Were the young girls clothed or unclothed in the photographs? 13 A. Unclothed. 14 Q. Where did you see those photographs in Epstein's house in Palm Beach? 16 A. They were in almost every room. 17 Q. Did there come a time that you were given clothing to wear when you were staying at Epstein's Palm Beach house? 19 A. Yes. 20 Q. What were you given to wear? 21 A. I was given a schoolgirl outfit. 22 Q. Can you please describe the schoolgirl outfit for the jury. 23 A. It was a short -- a short pleated skirt, white socks, white panties, and a shirt. 25 Q. Where did you find the schoolgirl outfit?

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a witness describing their experiences at Jeffrey Epstein's house in Palm Beach. The text is typed and there are no visible redactions or damage.
